text: Oh Nana by the way do you have any good game ideas in your head? If so allow me to introduce you to the BAFTA YGD! Just enter a game idea. Want a challenge? Make a game for the competition! I just though you might want to put your skills to the test! You can enter here:  <http://ygd.bafta.org/competition>                      :slightly_smiling_face:

attachments.title: GOT AN ORIGINAL IDEA FOR A GAME? WE WANT TO SEE IT! | BAFTA YGD
attachments.text: Are you looking to get into the games industry when you leave school? Or do you simply have a great game idea you want to share with the world?  Young Game Designers (YGD) is a BAFTA initiative for 10-18 year-olds, where just taking part opens up a world of creative opportunities and provides insights into making games. Enter the competition for a chance to win once-in-a-lifetime experiences with top game makers + industry professionals. There are three categories for entering into YGD:
attachments.fallback: GOT AN ORIGINAL IDEA FOR A GAME? WE WANT TO SEE IT! | BAFTA YGD

text: Thought about doing it for a while.
